channel.title: Sms on Textverified Updates
channel.description: Recent content in Sms on Textverified Updates

item.title: Textverified Chrome Extension
item.description: We are excited to announce the release of a Chrome Extension for Textverified. This extension will allow better integrated of SMS verifications on any webpage, reducing the need to navigate to the main Textverified website. You can find the extension on our app. Please note that this is a beta release. We aim to make the verification process easier than ever before, and your feedback will be invaluable to us as we work towards this goal.

item.title: New Feature: How to Receive SMS and Voice Calls for an AdGate Rental
item.description: New: Same line SMS and Voice Rentals We’re excited to announce the release of a long requested feature! You can now verify your AdGate accounts on the same line with SMS and/or voice with our number rentals. This means that you will no longer purchase AdGate verifications – instead, you will purchase the AdGate service on our rentals. This feature is still in beta and we have limited supply. Please give us any feedback or comments you may have.
